title: Two bedroom apartment 50m2 NON FURNISHED
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Perfect for couples or Roommates (2 or 3 roommates).
Lovely 2 bedroom apartment for rent near Belleville metro station, 20th arrondissement.
Total space 50m2.
NON FURNISHED
A living room + 2 bedrooms (the living room is separate and can be served as a room for a 3rd roommate).
Separate kitchen.
Shower and separate WC.
Lovely building, well maintained.
4th floor WITH AN ELEVATOR.
Safe and quiet. 
Lots of light. 
Original hardwood floors.
Chimney.

1500 euros per month including building charges and water.
Real estate agency fee to be paid on top of the rent (one time fee).
To schedule a visit, please send us an email or contact us on WhatsApp +33663087837
